bibl.title: A New Tax List from Hellenistic Egypt: A Preliminary Report. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper presented at the conference "Lustrum Saeculare Collegii: Conference Series in Celebration of the Hundred-Year-Old Premises of the Eötvös Collegium", Budapest, 25-28 October 2010. - Presentation of a group of fragments of an alphabetised tax list, extracted from mummy cartonnage. Middle Egypt or Fayum, first half or middle of the 2nd cent. B.C.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 60514 verso descr.; 60515 verso descr.; 60516 verso descr.; 60517 verso descr.; 60518 verso descr.
Láda Csaba A., A New Tax List from Hellenistic Egypt: A Preliminary Report. Avec résumé en anglais.

Revised version of a paper presented at the conference "Lustrum Saeculare Collegii: Conference Series in Celebration of the Hundred-Year-Old Premises of the Eötvös Collegium", Budapest, 25-28 October 2010. - Presentation of a group of fragments of an alphabetised tax list, extracted from mummy cartonnage. Middle Egypt or Fayum, first half or middle of the 2nd cent. B.C.
